test_scenarios.name: User Login - Successful Authentication
steps: Navigate to the Linear.app login page.
test_scenarios.expected_result: User is successfully logged in and redirected to the default workspace/team view.

test_scenarios.name: Create a New Issue
steps: Enter a title for the issue.
test_scenarios.expected_result: A new issue is created and visible in the project's issue list.

test_scenarios.name: Navigate to Different Boards
steps: Click on the board selection dropdown/menu.
Select a different board from the list.
test_scenarios.expected_result: The application navigates to the selected board, displaying its contents.
